languages.text: "Величественное зрелище. Словно огромной кистью все цвета мира смазали с холста реальности".
"An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."
languages.original_text: "Величественное зрелище. Словно огромной кистью все цвета мира смазали с холста реальности".

traits.locale_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “那真是令人望而生畏的景象。灭绝令就像一把巨大的刷子，将世界上所有的色彩从现实的画布上彻底抹除。”
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: “那真是令人望而生畏的景象。灭绝令就像一把巨大的刷子，将世界上所有的色彩从现实的画布上彻底抹除。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « C'est un spectacle de toute beauté, n'est-ce pas ? Comme si un gigantesque pinceau venait effacer toutes les couleurs du monde de la réalité. »
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un spectacle de toute beauté, n'est-ce pas ? Comme si un gigantesque pinceau venait effacer toutes les couleurs du monde de la réalité. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Es un espectáculo asombroso. Como un gran pincel borrando todos los colores de ese mundo del lienzo de la realidad».
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: «Es un espectáculo asombroso. Como un gran pincel borrando todos los colores de ese mundo del lienzo de la realidad».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「驚くべき光景が見えます。巨大な筆が、現実というキャンバスからこの星のあらゆる色を一掃しているようです」
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: 「驚くべき光景が見えます。巨大な筆が、現実というキャンバスからこの星のあらゆる色を一掃しているようです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ein atemberaubender Anblick. Wie ein riesiger Pinsel, der all die Farben der Welt von der Leinwand der Realität wischt."
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: "Ein atemberaubender Anblick. Wie ein riesiger Pinsel, der all die Farben der Welt von der Leinwand der Realität wischt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

languages.text: "Görülmeye değer müthişlikte bir manzara. Dünyanın tüm renklerini gerçekliğin tuvalinden silip koparan dev bir fırça âdeta."
languages.original_text: "An awesome sight to behold. Like a giant brush wiping all the colours of the world from the canvas of reality."

traits.locale_text: "Görülmeye değer müthişlikte bir manzara. Dünyanın tüm renklerini gerçekliğin tuvalinden silip koparan dev bir fırça âdeta."
